00001 #ifndef EXECUTOR_H
00002 #define EXECUTOR_H
00003 #include <unistd.h>
00004 #include <cstdio>
00005 #include <cstdlib>
00006 #include <sys/wait.h>
00007 #include <vector>
00008 #include <iostream>
00009 #include "Process.hpp"
00010 #include "Job.hpp"
00011 #include "Piper.hpp"
00012 
00013 
00014 class Executor {
00015 public:
00016         Executor (void) {};
00017         
00018         /*
00019          *      Executa um job
00020          *      @Param
00021          *              Ponteiro para o job a ser executado
00022          *      @Exception
00023          *              -1              erro no fork
00024          */
00025         
00026         void execute (Job* job) {
00027                 pid_t pid;
00028                 int status, err;
00029                 
00030                 pid = fork();
00031                 
00032                 if (pid < 0)    throw -1;
00033                 else if (pid == 0) { // o filho executa o processo
00034                         if (job->hasPipe()) {
00035                                 Piper piper;
00036                                 piper.execPipe (job);
00037                         } else {
00038                                 fprintf (stderr, "Executando %d\n", getpid());
00039                                 job->setPGID(getpid());
00040                                 job->getProcess(0)->setPID(getpid());
00041                                 setpgid (getpid(), getpid());
00042                                 fprintf (stderr, "novo valor do pgid %d\n", job->getPGID());
00043                                 
00044                                 //TODO setar atributos(?)
00045                                 if (!job->inBG()) //se for foreground
00046                                         tcsetpgrp (STDIN_FILENO, job->getPGID()); //vira o dono do terminal
00047                                 signal (SIGINT, SIG_DFL);
00048                                 signal (SIGQUIT, SIG_DFL);
00049                                 signal (SIGTSTP, SIG_DFL);
00050                                 signal (SIGTTIN, SIG_DFL);
00051                                 signal (SIGTTOU, SIG_DFL);
00052                                 signal (SIGCHLD, SIG_DFL);
00053                                 if (job->getProcess(0)->hasRedirection()) {
00054                                         Redirector r;
00055                                         r.init (job->getProcess(0)->getFilenames(), job->getProcess(0)->getRedirFlags());
00056                                 }
00057                                 
00058                                 execvp(job->getProcess(0)->getCommand()[0], job->getProcess(0)->getCommand());
00059                         }
00060                 } else { // shell
00061                         job->getProcess(0)->setPID(getpid());
00062                         job->setPGID(getpid());
00063                         setpgid (pid, pid);
00064                         if (!job->inBG()) {
00065                                 
00066                                 fprintf (stderr, "%d em foreground\n", pid);
00067                                 if (waitpid(pid, &status, WUNTRACED) == -1){
00068                                         fprintf (stderr, "erro no waitpid\n");
00069                                 } else {
00070                                         if (WIFEXITED(status))  std::cout << "Filho " << pid << " morreu em paz " << WEXITSTATUS(status) << std::endl;
00071                                         else if (WIFSIGNALED(status))   std::cout << "Filho " << pid << " recebeu sinal " << WTERMSIG(status) << std::endl;
00072                                         else if (WIFSTOPPED(status))    std::cout << "Filho " << pid << " foi parado com sinal " << WSTOPSIG(status) << std::endl;
00073                                 }
00074                         }
00075                         // Pega os atributos do job
00076                         tcgetattr(STDIN_FILENO, job->getTermios());
00077                         fprintf (stderr, "fim da funcao %d\n", job->getPGID());
00078                 }
00079         }
00080 };
